divs: Sighting DetailsOn May 10 2010, at aproximate 10:51pm Eastern time, I was taking my Dog out in company of my Mother, When I looked up in the sky. Clear night, no clouds in the sky, cold night no wind, no bright lights around our house, PA northeastern, near the Backmountain area),and then We saw this particularly Big Bright Round light, coming about as high as an airplane, but with no sound at all, just floating in the sky, it was floating for a few seconds more and then it faded until it dissapeared above our heads. I dont have an idea What it was. I got nervous but We didnt react that much because We dont have an idea what that thing was, never had an experience like that before.
Summary: Bright round large light floating instead of flying like a plane.
